extendedInfo.description: Upward Mobility's presents its dedicated Android app for the the 70-680: Configuring Windows 7 exam. This app is a valuable tool written by certified experts, with original questions prepared exclusively for Upward Mobility. This module contains a targeted curriculum of 107 simulated exam questions dealing with topics on the Network Infrastructure Exam.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.In our 70-680 module, each question is paired with a clear and insightful explanation paired with a Key Takeaway that summarizes the key learning point of the question, ensuring comprehensive understanding of the material. Not only that, Key Takeaways support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career. This module combines questions that focus on core concepts and vocabulary, as well as scenarios that simulate the ones a technician would face in real life.MCTS OverviewThe Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS) certifications provide the foundation for Microsoft Certification. These certifications are designed to validate your skills on the features and functionality of key technologies. You can show your depth of knowledge in one specific technology, earn multiple MCTS certifications to show breadth across different products, or build on the MCTS to earn a Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) credential.MCITP OverviewThe Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) certification helps validate that an individual has the comprehensive set of skills necessary to perform a particular job role, such as database administrator or enterprise messaging administrator. MCITP certifications build on the technical proficiency measured in the Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS) certifications. Therefore, you will earn one or more MCTS certifications on your way to earning an MCITP certification.This app is not affiliated with Microsoft.Upward Mobility apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.About Upward Mobility Upward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you. We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.comment: I did the real exam today and only just failed, this uses almost the same questions, now I know where I went wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t know why people say the questions are too easy. I used the app for 3 days, walked into Prometric and passed my 70-680 first try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless - Outdated
reviews.comment: The 70-680 test currentky as of this date has a pool of over 377 questions. This app only uses 107 and 50% of the questions used in this app have not been updated correctly. Studying for the 70-680 exam using this software is worthless.  Search the Internet and you will quickly learn that the pool of questions for this test has been updated throughout 2013 and even the update done in 2012 are not applied to this app. Worthless!
reviews.author: Brian S

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Over 100 questions. Many were on the test. This should not be your only source but a lot of thought went in to this and is well worth the money.
reviews.author: Ron Cooper

reviews.comment: As good as some programs i\'ve paid 30+ for. Explains why answer is correct. Got the glitches i had before are taken care of. Awesome way to study.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not usefull
reviews.comment: Took an actual test today and failed. None of the question were remotely close to the questions in this program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app to study and test your skills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great product!!!
reviews.comment: Multiple study modes and explanations regarding the correct answers.  Works well on my Droid phone and I can study anywhere! Great customer service!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: Has only 28 questions. Waisting of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very poor!!
reviews.comment: Just took the actuall exam and none of the material in this app was covered in the test. Wouldnt bother!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Could use better explanation, and more questions to randomize from
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The questions are unrealistically easy. I wish I could return it but it won\'t let me. Also- it does not explain why the other choices are wrong. Bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has problems on dell streak. Force closed twice in the first use. its a shame coz its looked useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great prep tool well worth the $.
reviews.author: A Google User
